item.description:
09 Mar 15:56
eymar
v1.3.1
d6929ca
Compare
Choose a tag to compare
View all tags
1.3.1 Latest
Latest

Common

  • Added support for Kotlin 1.8.10

Fixes

  • Layout in movableContent
  • Unzip wix to build directory

Desktop

Fixes

  • Korean text input
  • Size UndecoratedWindowResizer to the size of the window
  • Fix sizing a window with unspecified size to its content's size

Dependencies

This version of Compose Multiplatform is based on the next Jetpack Compose libraries:

  • Compiler 1.4.2
  • Runtime 1.3.3
  • UI 1.3.3
  • Foundation 1.3.1
  • Material 1.3.1
  • Material3 1.0.1
Assets 2
42 people reacted

item.description:
30 Jan 16:17
jb-compose-bot
v1.3.0
71c78a4
Compare
Choose a tag to compare
View all tags
1.3.0

Common

Fixes

  • Fix configuration cache issues
  • Use global directory to download wix toolset
  • IDEA plugin - Redo: set until-build to undefined value

Desktop

Features

  • Desktop AlertDialog scrim color
  • Material 3 DropdownMenu Skiko support

Fixes

  • Fix San Francisco font as a default (macOS)
  • Make ScrollbarAdapter for LazyList take contentPadding into account
  • Fix AlertDialog dismiss on click to Dialog content
  • Fix shaky scrolling of LazyColumn when the items are of varying size

Dependencies

This version of Compose Multiplatform is based on the next Jetpack Compose libraries:

  • Compiler 1.4.0
  • Runtime 1.3.3
  • UI 1.3.3
  • Foundation 1.3.1
  • Material 1.3.1
  • Material3 1.0.1
Assets 2
77 people reacted
